Function	Serine/threonine protein kinase required for spermatid differentiation and male fertility (PubMed:37146716, PubMed:38781365). Promotes sperm flagella assembly during spermatogenesis by mediating phosphorylation of fibrous sheath proteins AKAP3 and AKAP4 (By similarity). Also phosphorylates vimentin/VIM, thereby regulating the dynamic behavior of the intermediate filament cytoskeleton (By similarity).
